alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 21 at 2:04PM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant to locally devastating icing expected. Total ice accretion of one quarter to one half of an inch, with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Pamlico, Coastal Onslow, Inland Onslow, Jones, Southern Craven and West Carteret Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. The hazardous conditions may impact the evening commute tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An Ice Storm Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Significant amounts of ice accumulations will make travel dangerous or impossible. Travel is strongly discouraged. Commerce will likely be severely impacted. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Ice accumulations and winds will likely lead to snapped power lines and falling tree branches that add to the danger.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions for North Carolina can be found online at DriveNC.gov.
